species.name: togekiss
descriptions: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.
It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.
Known as a bringer of blessings, it’s been depicted on good-luck charms since ancient times.
Scant few have ever sighted this Pokémon. After studying what literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when peace reigns in the land.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: super-luck
abilities.effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.
